transformations.name: MapDrifted1
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Segment as string,
		Country as string,
		{ Product } as string,
		{ Discount Band } as string,
		{Units Sold} as short,
		{ Manufacturing Price } as string,
		{ Sale Price } as string,
		{ Gross Sales } as string,
		{ Discounts } as string,
		{  Sales } as string,
		{ COGS } as string,
		{ Profit } as string,
		Date as date,
		{Month Number} as short,
		{ Month Name } as string,
		Year as short,
		MyCountry as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 sort(desc(Year, true)) ~> Sort1
Sort1 select(mapColumn(
		Segment,
		{Units Sold},
		Year
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 pivot(groupBy(Segment),
	pivotBy(Year),
	UnitsSold = sum({Units Sold}),
	columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: false) ~> Pivot1
Pivot1 derive({2013} = toLong(byName('UnitsSold2013')),
		{2014} = toLong(byName('UnitsSold2014'))) ~> MapDrifted1
MapDrifted1 unpivot(output(
		Year as string,
		UnitsSold as long
	),
	ungroupBy(Segment),
	lateral: true,
	ignoreNullPivots: true) ~> Unpivot1
MapDrifted1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['PIvot.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
Unpivot1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['Unpivot.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2
